thread.title: Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live'

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live'
text:
Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live' Donald Trump Jim Cole / AP 
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks during a No Labels Problem Solver convention Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Manchester, N.H. 
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks during a No Labels Problem Solver convention Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Manchester, N.H. (Jim Cole / AP) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter 
Donald Trump has signed onto host the November 7 episode of “Saturday Night Live,” NBC announced Tuesday. 
This marks the presidential hopeful’s second time as host of the late-night sketch show. He previously hosted the April 3, 2004 episode. 
Sia will be the musical guest. 
Variety
